post.text: We face a serious choice on Tuesday: Will we act to protect the planet for our kids and grandkids, or do nothing? hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Abby
comment.text: we cant wait to see Trump win and be our next President! you have alot of criminal investigations going on-how can you concentrate on being the president? your criminal acts will keep you very busy for years to come! I cant wait for someone like you to prove your loyalty-Trump is what we need now! you are not our next leader for America! we will pray for you=you will need prayers for all you have done! shame on you!

replies.author: Abby
replies.text: not a dream-a reality for me and a nightmare for whats ahead for all them

replies.author: Abby
replies.text: no need to comment-you dont live here in America-or do you live here as a US citizen?

replies.author: Alexine
replies.text: Theres a lot of people from other countries on here. Hillary hired them to post comments.
